talker.py

1 #!/usr/bin/env python
2 # license removed for brevity
3 import rospy
4 from robotic_skin.sensor.adxl335 import ADXL335
5 from sensor_msgs.msg import Imu
6 
7 
8 def talker():
9  pub = rospy.Publisher('/imu', Imu, queue_size=100)
10  rospy.init_node('talker', anonymous=True)
11  r = rospy.Rate(100)
12 
13  accel_sensor = ADXL335(xpin=0, ypin=1, zpin=2)
14  imu_msg = Imu()
15 
16  while not rospy.is_shutdown():
17  data = accel_sensor._read_raw()
18  imu_msg.linear_acceleration.x = data[0]
19  imu_msg.linear_acceleration.y = data[1]
20  imu_msg.linear_acceleration.z = data[2]
21 
22  pub.publish(imu_msg)
23  r.sleep()
24 
25 
26 if __name__ == '__main__':
27  try:
28  talker()
29  except rospy.ROSInterruptException:
30  pass
